name: Phantom Limbs
description:
Created for the Demake Jam, Phantom Limbs is a demake of Metal Gear Solid V styled after the MSX originals. Travel into Afghanistan as Atlas and rescue your comrade-in-arms who has been captured by the enemy. Stay out of sight, however -- you're outmanned and outgunned. Explore the base, find weapons to aid in your mission, and find your friend!

Controls

WASD - movement

Left Shift - ready weapon (if you've found one); ready your weapon when sneaking behind an enemy to hold them up!

Space - shoot weapon (if you've found one)

E - talk to friends or foes (context-specific)

1 and 2 - switch weapons (when you've found them)
